BuilderSettings.GlobalSettingsDescription: Configure the global settings of your site, such as typography, colors, spacing, and logos.
BuilderSettings.FormErrors: There are errors in the form. Please correct them before submitting.
BuilderSettings.TypographyDescription: Define the text styles used on your site.
BuilderSettings.ColorsDescription: Define the color palette of your site.
BuilderSettings.SpacingDescription: Configure the spacing and margins used in the layout.
BuilderSettings.LogosDescription: Upload and manage your site's logos.
BuilderSettings.ErrorMessage: An error occurred while saving the settings.

LogoEditor.Title: Logos
LogoEditor.FileTypeError: Only PNG or JPEG files are accepted.
